The puzzles and sense of humour in this game set it apart from the rest

An American, a German and a Russian got to a desert island. Once a bottle was washed up on the island, they opened it, and from there-a genie: - You have freed me, I will fulfill two of your wishes! - A bag of money and go home! - said the American and disappeared. - A mug of beer and go home! - said the German and was gone. - It was a good company, a box of vodka and everyone back! "What's the matter?" said the Russian.

Отзывы никто не читает, так что оставлю тут рецепт оладушек.

Ингредиенты:
Сахар 3 столовые ложки
Молоко 200 мл
Соль по вкусу
Пшеничная мука 200 г
Куриное яйцо 1 штука
Растительное масло 50 мл
Уксус 9%-ный ½ чайной ложки
Сода ½ чайной ложки
40 минут
Инструкция приготовления

1. Муку, сахар и щепотку соли смешайте.
2. Яйцо взбейте с молоком, добавьте гашеную уксусом соду. Добавьте муку. Замесите до однородной массы. Тесто должно получиться густым. По необходимости добавьте еще муки.
3. Порциями примерно со столовую ложку вылейте тесто на раскаленную сковороду. Обжарьте с обеих сторон на среднем огне
If the first Portal game was like some sort of a cake mix, Portal 2 would be the amazingly designed cake that would be made with it.

This might be one of my new favorite games so far.

Absolutely loved it. The story and game itself are waaaaay bigger than the original Portal. It might take a little bit more time to complete but it's totally worth diving in. The puzzles are great, the level design is amazing, the music and sound design is beautiful, the characters are full of personality and charm, the story is sick and full of mystery . Totally an amazing game.
Los desarrolladores no se dejaron una sola buena idea sin emplear. Tanto el modo cooperativo como el single player son buenisimos.
One of the best games ive played in a while

the story will give you happiness
the co op will give you anger issues

overall its a great game, play it.

This game makes think and breaks your brain a bit. But after each level it also award you with decent dose of satisfaction when you resolve another puzzle. Coop mode is made on decent level and offers additional portion of fun for you and your mate.

o jogo é muito gostoso de jogar, os puzzles não são frustrantes, a história é entregue de maneira sutil mas ao mesmo tempo satisfatória, etc... 
O jogo é muito bom, a unica parte dele que começou a ficar meio repetitivo é perto do final mas ainda assim não fica ruim.

i have just played this game for the first time, i am stunned at how amazing and funny a 10 year old game is. also the graphics still hold up in currently year which is epic

меня назвали толстым и я узнал что я приемный
Голосовой чат прекрасен в игре мы с дружбаном угараем уже 4 день с него. Порталы прекрасны ими можно убивать напарника различными способами.

The game is Beautiful in every way possible. The journey of adventure you are taken on that sees you travel through pipes and across moving terrain and puzzle obstacles is incredible.

One of the best games I will ever play. And had I have been younger when I played this initially, my jaw would have dropped even more so and I definitely would've had my mind-blown in so many ways. Everything about this experience is Breathtaking. Not just the absolute finale, but the last couple of hours are unbelievably well made. The puzzles made me happy to have had figured them out with only one task I had to look up because I didn't get it. And they get better as the story progresses.   

Robot characters' voice is annoying. British guy is very condescending. A bit too convincing.

They had another funny fun song in the end, but the operatic song before it is Golden and is the best thing in video games ever!

Люблю Portal 2 прежде всего за его атмосферу ( Хоть сюжет очень неплох, а история жизни Керолайн/GlaDOS очень проработана ). Прекрасная музыка Майка Мораски и гигантские помещения с испытательными камерами создают загадочную обстановку, хотя настольгия тоже делает своё дело, так как игру я проходил 6 раз, и она мне очень близка. Вообщем, как говорил мой близкий друг " игра кру кто не купит тот лошпендель ".

Интересная игра, много плюсов
1)Сюжет
2)Кооп. режим
3)Отличная графика
4)оптимизация

Absolutely awesome game. As someone who actually plays very few games (I'm a poor college student; sue me), and completes even fewer, this game was super user-friendly. I'm always nervous that I'll get lost or not know where to go in these kinds of games but even I was able to follow the paths really easily. The humor was right up my alley, and the chambers are so much fun and are really a workout for your brain sometimes. Every time I died it was 100% my fault; the mechanics are really easy to get the hang of and it controls pretty well too. 10/10. I'm so excited to start my second playthrough.
